ACTION REPORT

January 16, 2001

Items being done this month:

  1. Re-roofing the South buildings began in late December.

  2. Cleaning of the entry tiles will begin late January.

  3. Reflex kick-off party was tonight.

  4. Quick books is now functioning, the January invoices went out with very few problems.

  5. The first set of checks to pay bills was done for signature at this meeting.

Items to be done next month:

  1. Tile bids are also hard to get but we are still working on it.

  2. Bids are in regarding the final trimming and removal of the Palm trees that touch the buildings.

Items being done by maintenance:

  1. Bathrooms in the south clubhouse have been repaired and painted. Also the hall going to the bathrooms has been done.

  2. Bathrooms and hall in the north clubhouse are being painted and repaired at this time.

  3. All light bulbs have been replaced, we are waiting for the ballast for the poles to come in.

Items completed last month:

  1. The South Clubhouse has been cleaned and old furniture removed.

  2. Janitorial staff is now in place and functioning.
